docs.text: Local Environment ¶ Merely docker runs ¶ #create a local network, so that containers can see each other docker network create mynetwork # create the backend Redis container and attach it to the network docker run --name redis -d --network mynetwork redis:alpine # create the app container, expose it in a different port docker run -p 5500 :5000 -it --network mynetwork -e "REDIS_HOST=redis" mcano/docker:intro # OR if you prefer local environment development supported by Docker docker run -p 5500 :5000 -it --network mynetwork -e "REDIS_HOST=redis" -v $( pwd ) :/code mcano/docker:intro sh
